mapper.insert: insert into staff_table (STAFF_ID, STAFF_NAME, IDENTITY_ID, STAFF_COUNT, STAFF_PASSWORD, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIED_TIME, STATUS) values (#{staffId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.LocalDateTimeTypeHandler}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.LocalDateTimeTypeHandler}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR})

update staff_table
STAFF_NAME = #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDENTITY_ID = #{identityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.LocalDateTimeTypeHandler},
MODIFIED_TIME = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.LocalDateTimeTypeHandler},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
where STAFF_ID = #{staffId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update staff_table set STAFF_NAME = #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDENTITY_ID = #{identityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STAFF_COUNT = #{staffCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STAFF_PASSWORD = #{staffPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.LocalDateTimeTypeHandler}, MODIFIED_TIME = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.LocalDateTimeTypeHandler}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR} where STAFF_ID = #{staffId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select
from staff_table where STAFF_COUNT = #{count, jdbcType=BIGINT} and STATUS = '1'
